test=input()
for num in range(test):
    l=input()
    s=raw_input().split()
    
    t=[]
    for n in range(l):
      t.append(int(s[n]))
      
    count=0
    
    for n in range(l-1):
     
      x=n+1
      p=0
      while x<=l-1:
        if t[x]-t[n]==(x-n):
          p=p+1
        x=x+1
      if p>count:
        count=p
    print l-count-1
